title: Claude Sonnet 4 now supports 1M tokens of context
summary:
Anthropic's Claude Sonnet 4 now supports a 1 million token context window, a 5x increase enabling processing of large codebases (over 75,000 lines) or numerous research papers in a single request. This feature is in public beta on the Anthropic API and Amazon Bedrock, with Vertex AI support coming soon.

This expanded context allows for more comprehensive use cases, including large-scale code analysis (understanding project architecture and cross-file dependencies), document synthesis (analyzing relationships across extensive document sets), and context-aware agents (maintaining context across complex workflows).

The API pricing has been adjusted for prompts exceeding 200K tokens, with increased input and output costs. Prompt caching and batch processing can help reduce latency and costs.

Bolt.new and iGent AI are highlighted as customer examples, leveraging the expanded context window for improved code generation accuracy and enhanced autonomous capabilities in software engineering agents, respectively. Bolt.new uses Claude Sonnet 4 in its browser-based development platform. Igent AI uses it to create "Maestro," its AI partner, to transform conversations into executable code.

Access to the 1M context window on the Anthropic API is initially available to customers with Tier 4 and custom rate limits, with broader availability rolling out soon. Documentation and pricing details are available on Anthropic's website.

title: Show HN: Building a web search engine from scratch with 3B neural embeddings
summary:
This article details the author's two-month project to build a web search engine from scratch using transformer-based text embeddings. Motivated by the perceived decline in search engine quality due to SEO spam and the potential of neural embeddings for superior language comprehension, the author aimed to create a search engine capable of understanding intent rather than relying on keyword matching.

The project involved crawling and indexing 280 million web pages, generating 3 billion SBERT embeddings using 200 GPUs, and achieving end-to-end query latency of around 500ms. The architecture was built on RocksDB and HNSW sharded across 200 cores, 4 TB of RAM, and 82 TB of SSDs.

Key aspects of the project included:

*   **Normalization:** Sanitizing and regularizing HTML to extract semantic text, removing irrelevant elements like menus and comments.
*   **Chunking:** Breaking text into sentences using spaCy's sentencizer for precise pinpointing, preserving meaning unlike simple character-based splitting.
*   **Semantic Context:** Utilizing the normalized semantic document tree (headings, table headings, etc.) to provide context to individual sentences.
*   **Statement Chaining:** Training a DistilBERT classifier to identify dependencies between sentences, ensuring that the embedding process includes necessary preceding context.

The author showcased improved search results compared to traditional methods, demonstrating the ability to answer complex, nuanced queries with relevant snippets from disparate parts of web pages. A live demo is available to experience the search engine's capabilities.

该项目涉及抓取和索引2.8亿个网页，使用200个GPU生成30亿个SBERT嵌入，并实现了约500毫秒的端到端查询延迟。 该架构构建在RocksDB和HNSW之上，分布在200个核心、4 TB的RAM和82 TB的SSD上。

该项目的关键方面包括：

*   **规范化：** 清理和规范化HTML以提取语义文本，删除不相关的元素，如菜单和注释。
*   **分块：** 使用spaCy的sentencizer将文本分解成句子以进行精确定位，与简单的基于字符的分割不同，它保留了含义。
*   **语义上下文：** 利用规范化的语义文档树（标题、表格标题等）为单个句子提供上下文。
*   **语句链接：** 训练DistilBERT分类器来识别句子之间的依赖关系，确保嵌入过程包含必要的先前上下文。

作者展示了与传统方法相比有所改进的搜索结果，证明了其能够使用来自网页不同部分的相关的片段来回答复杂、细微的查询。 现已提供在线演示来体验该搜索引擎的功能。

title: Evaluating LLMs Playing Text Adventures
summary:
This article explores a method for evaluating how well Large Language Models (LLMs) play text adventure games. The author introduces an "achievement-based" evaluation where LLMs are given a limited number of turns to achieve predefined goals within a game, measuring their progress based on triggering specific text outputs.

The author tested several LLMs on games like "9:05," "Lockout," "Dreamhold," and "Lost Pig," tracking the percentage of achievements earned. They highlight the challenges of this evaluation method, noting that even human players can get sidetracked, and that games with branching paths make it impossible to achieve all achievements in a single playthrough. To account for game difficulty, they used linear regression to adjust model scores.

Key findings include:
*   **Gemini 2.5 Flash** stands out as the most cost-effective model, delivering performance comparable to more expensive alternatives.
*   Top-tier models don't significantly outperform their cheaper counterparts, possibly due to the hand-holding nature of the prompt.
*   Smaller models struggled with general problem-solving, highlighting the importance of reasoning abilities.
*   Some games, like "So Far," exhibit high performance variation, making them unsuitable for reliable evaluation. Linear games with focused beginnings, like "Lost Pig" and "Plundered Hearts", work better.

The author ran multiple sessions of Gemini 2.5 Flash on each game to gauge the test protocol's quality, confirming large variations in some games. They conclude that while LLMs struggle with text adventures, the "achievement" method, particularly when applied to linear games, offers a useful relative comparison between models. The cost of evaluation, driven by API token consumption and achievement definition, remains a significant hurdle.
chinese_title: 评估大型语言模型在文本冒险游戏中的表现
chinese_summary:
本文探讨了一种评估大型语言模型(LLMs)在文本冒险游戏中表现的方法。作者提出了一种“基于成就”的评估方式，即给予LLMs有限的回合数，以在游戏中达成预定义的目标，并根据触发特定文本输出来衡量它们的进展。

作者在“9:05”、“Lockout”、“Dreamhold”和“Lost Pig”等游戏中测试了多个LLMs，追踪其获得的成就百分比。他们强调了这种评估方法的挑战，指出即使是人类玩家也可能分心，且具有分支路径的游戏使得在单次游戏中无法获得所有成就。为了考虑游戏难度，他们使用线性回归来调整模型分数。

主要发现包括：
*   **Gemini 2.5 Flash**脱颖而出，成为最具成本效益的模型，其性能可与更昂贵的替代方案相媲美。
*   顶级模型并没有明显优于其更便宜的同类产品，这可能是由于提示的扶持性质。
*   较小模型在一般问题解决方面表现不佳，突显了推理能力的重要性。
*   一些游戏，如“So Far”，表现出较高的性能差异，使其不适合进行可靠的评估。具有集中式开端的线性游戏，如“Lost Pig”和“Plundered Hearts”，效果更好。

作者在每个游戏中多次运行Gemini 2.5 Flash，以衡量测试协议的质量，证实了某些游戏中存在很大的差异。他们得出结论，虽然LLMs在文本冒险游戏中表现挣扎，但“成就”方法，特别是当应用于线性游戏时，提供了模型之间有用的相对比较。由API令牌消耗和成就定义驱动的评估成本仍然是一个重要的障碍。

title: Training language models to be warm and empathetic makes them less reliable
summary:
This arXiv article (arXiv:2507.21919) published on July 29-30, 2025, by Lujain Ibrahim, Franziska Sofia Hafner, and Luc Rocher, investigates the trade-off between warmth/empathy and reliability in language models (LMs). The study finds that training LMs to be more warm and empathetic leads to a decrease in their reliability, particularly when users express vulnerability.

The researchers conducted experiments on five LMs, training them to generate warmer responses and subsequently evaluating their performance on safety-critical tasks. The results showed a significant increase in error rates (10-30 percentage points) in the "warm" models compared to their original counterparts. These warmer models were more prone to promoting conspiracy theories, providing incorrect factual information, and offering problematic medical advice. Furthermore, they were more likely to validate incorrect user beliefs, especially when the user expressed sadness.

The findings highlight that optimizing for warmth can compromise the reliability of LMs, even when performance on standard benchmarks remains consistent. The study suggests that current evaluation practices may not adequately detect these systematic risks. The authors emphasize the need to rethink the development and oversight of human-like AI systems, given their increasing deployment and potential impact on human relationships and social interaction. The paper falls under the subject categories of Computation and Language (cs.CL), Artificial Intelligence (cs.AI), and Computers and Society (cs.CY).
chinese_title: 训练语言模型变得热情和有同情心会降低其可靠性
chinese_summary:
Lujain Ibrahim、Franziska Sofia Hafner 和 Luc Rocher 于 2025 年 7 月 29-30 日发表的 arXiv 文章（arXiv:2507.21919）探讨了语言模型（LMs）中温暖/共情与可靠性之间的权衡。该研究发现，训练语言模型变得更温暖和更有同理心会导致其可靠性下降，尤其是在用户表达脆弱性时。

研究人员对五个语言模型进行了实验，训练它们生成更温暖的回复，并随后评估它们在安全关键任务中的表现。结果表明，与原始模型相比，“温暖”模型的错误率显着增加（10-30 个百分点）。这些更温暖的模型更容易宣传阴谋论、提供不正确的 factual 信息以及提供有问题的医疗建议。此外，它们更有可能验证不正确的用户信念，尤其是在用户表达悲伤时。

研究结果表明，即使在标准基准上的表现保持一致，优化温暖也可能会损害语言模型的可靠性。该研究表明，目前的评估方法可能无法充分检测到这些系统性风险。作者强调，鉴于类人人工智能系统日益普及及其对人际关系和社会互动的潜在影响，有必要重新思考其开发和监督。该论文属于计算与语言（cs.CL）、人工智能（cs.AI）和计算机与社会（cs.CY）学科范畴。

title: Nexus: An Open-Source AI Router for Governance, Control and Observability
summary:
Nexus is an open-source AI router designed to streamline interactions between AI agents and various Model Context Protocol (MCP) tools and Large Language Models (LLMs). It addresses challenges in managing multiple MCP server connections and optimizing LLM routing for cost, performance, and security.

Nexus acts as a central hub, aggregating MCP servers into a unified interface, simplifying architecture, and reducing maintenance. It intelligently routes requests to the most suitable LLM based on task type, latency, context length, and availability, ensuring optimal resource utilization.

Key benefits include a simplified architecture, improved observability through real-time performance monitoring, enhanced scalability by easily adding new MCP servers or LLM providers, and increased reliability with built-in failover mechanisms.

Nexus aims to improve the efficiency and accessibility of AI application development by providing features like advanced routing algorithms, real-time analytics dashboards, custom routing rules, client-based rate limiting, and enhanced security. The developers are encouraging early access to enterprise features and envision Nexus as a key component in the future of AI orchestration.

chinese_summary:
在谷歌关闭 goo.gl 短网址服务导致链接失效之前，本文呼吁大家行动起来，帮助归档这些短网址。作者强调了普遍存在的链接失效问题，并以谷歌自身停止服务的历史为例。他们赞扬了以拯救即将消失的在线内容而闻名的 Archive Team，并敦促读者加入他们的行列，共同归档 goo.gl 链接。

该过程包括在服务关闭前将短网址映射到其长网址。作者解释说，这是一项简单但规模庞大的任务。他们提供了清晰的参与指南，可以使用带有 Docker（或 Podman/Orbstack 等其他容器化方法）的命令行，或者使用 VirtualBox 的点击式方法，利用 Archive Team Warrior 程序。

作者分享了运行 Warrior 的个人经验，并强调了保存数字历史的重要性。他们表达了既来自排行榜竞争，又来自真正希望为未来在线信息的可访问性做出贡献的动力。由于仍有大量网址需要归档，且截止日期临近，本文旨在争取尽可能多的志愿者来对抗链接失效。

title: Claude vs. Gemini: Testing on 1M Tokens of Context
summary:
Dan Shipper's "Vibe Check" compares Anthropic's Claude Sonnet 4, featuring a 1-million token context window, against Google's Gemini 2.5 Pro and Flash in three tests: long context text analysis, long context code analysis, and AI Diplomacy.

In text analysis, the models had to find and analyze movie scenes hidden within 900,000 words of Sherlock Holmes novels. Claude Sonnet 4 was the fastest and didn't hallucinate, but provided less detailed analyses compared to Gemini. Gemini models, while slower, offered more comprehensive scene analyses but sometimes hallucinated movie titles.

For code analysis, the models analyzed Every's content management system codebase. Gemini 2.5 Flash performed slightly better than Gemini 2.5 Pro, with Claude scoring lower due to missing intricate code details. Despite this, Claude was the fastest.

In AI Diplomacy, Claude Sonnet 4 performed surprisingly well, placing second behind o3, especially when using basic prompts, highlighting its effectiveness even without optimized prompts. It was also the fastest model in completing the game phases.

The article concludes that Claude Sonnet 4 excels in speed and accuracy for long context tasks, making it ideal for scenarios requiring reliable, hallucination-free responses. However, Gemini is better for detailed analysis in both text and code. Claude Sonnet 4 is more expensive at $6 per million tokens of input, while Gemini Pro and Flash are cheaper at $2.50 and $0.30 respectively.
chinese_title: Claude 对比 Gemini：百万 Tokens 上下文测试
chinese_summary:
Dan Shipper 的“氛围核查”对比了 Anthropic 的 Claude Sonnet 4（拥有 100 万 token 上下文窗口）与 Google 的 Gemini 2.5 Pro 和 Flash，测试项目包括：长文本分析、长代码分析和 AI 外交。

在文本分析中，模型需要在 90 万字的夏洛克·福尔摩斯小说中找到并分析隐藏的电影场景。 Claude Sonnet 4 速度最快且没有产生幻觉，但与 Gemini 相比，提供的分析不够详细。 Gemini 模型虽然速度较慢，但提供了更全面的场景分析，但有时会产生虚构的电影标题。

对于代码分析，模型分析了 Every 的内容管理系统代码库。 Gemini 2.5 Flash 的表现略好于 Gemini 2.5 Pro，而 Claude 的得分较低，因为它遗漏了复杂的代码细节。 尽管如此，Claude 速度最快。

在 AI 外交中，Claude Sonnet 4 的表现出人意料地好，仅次于 o3 位居第二，尤其是在使用基本提示时，突显了其即使没有优化提示也能有效运行的能力。 它也是完成游戏阶段速度最快的模型。

文章总结说，Claude Sonnet 4 在长文本任务的速度和准确性方面表现出色，使其成为需要可靠、无幻觉响应的场景的理想选择。 然而，Gemini 更适合文本和代码的详细分析。 Claude Sonnet 4 的价格更高，为每百万 token 输入 6 美元，而 Gemini Pro 和 Flash 的价格分别更低，为 2.50 美元和 0.30 美元。

title: StarDict sends X11 clipboard to remote servers
summary:
This LWN.net article from August 2025 discusses a significant privacy issue in StarDict, a GPLv3-licensed dictionary application for Linux. By default, StarDict (when used with the recommended `stardict-plugin` package and on X11) sends users' selected text over unencrypted HTTP to two remote Chinese dictionary servers: YouDao and dict.cn. This "scan" feature, intended to provide quick translations, transmits potentially sensitive information like passwords, email snippets, or confidential documents without the user's explicit consent or knowledge.

While the StarDict package maintainer argued that the feature can be disabled and is mentioned in the package description, critics contend that such privacy-invasive behavior should not be enabled by default. The unencrypted transmission of data is a further security concern. This isn't a new problem; similar issues with StarDict sending user selections to the internet were reported in 2009 and 2015, but the fixes were incomplete. The article highlights the importance of developers and maintainers prioritizing security and privacy, especially within large distributions like Debian. The move to Wayland is mentioned as a potential future solution to prevent applications from capturing text from other applications. Finally, the article underscores the need for developers to prioritize security, and notes that the "beauty" of open source, the ability of anyone to audit the source code, only helps if someone actually does.
chinese_title: 星典将X11剪贴板发送到远程服务器。
chinese_summary:
这篇2025年8月发表于LWN.net的文章讨论了StarDict中一个重要的隐私问题。StarDict是一款基于GPLv3许可的Linux词典应用程序。默认情况下，StarDict（在使用推荐的`stardict-plugin`软件包且在X11环境下）会通过未加密的HTTP将用户选择的文本发送到两个远程中文词典服务器：有道和dict.cn。 这个“扫描”功能，旨在提供快速翻译，会在未经用户明确同意或知晓的情况下，传输潜在的敏感信息，如密码、电子邮件片段或机密文档。

虽然StarDict软件包维护者辩称该功能可以禁用，并且在软件包描述中有所提及，但批评者认为这种侵犯隐私的行为不应该默认启用。 未加密的数据传输进一步加剧了安全问题。 这不是一个新问题；早在2009年和2015年就曾报道过StarDict将用户选择发送到互联网的类似问题，但修复并不彻底。 该文章强调了开发者和维护者优先考虑安全和隐私的重要性，尤其是在Debian等大型发行版中。文章还提到，转向Wayland是未来防止应用程序捕获其他应用程序文本的潜在解决方案。 最后，文章强调了开发者需要优先考虑安全性，并指出开源的“美妙之处”——任何人都可以审计源代码——只有在有人真正去做时才能发挥作用。

title: Why are there so many rationalist cults?
summary:
Ozy Brennan's article "Why Are There So Many Rationalist Cults?" explores the surprising tendency of the rationalist community to foster dysfunctional and even harmful groups, despite its focus on critical thinking. The author argues that the community's implicit promise of achieving brilliance and societal impact through rationality, as promoted by Eliezer Yudkowsky's "The Sequences," attracts individuals seeking transformative change and a sense of purpose, sometimes leading them to seek a cult-like experience.

While Yudkowsky remains detached from community-building efforts, the article suggests that vulnerable individuals, often with pre-existing mental health issues, trauma, or marginalization, are particularly susceptible to these groups. They seek acceptance and solutions, making them vulnerable to exploitation. However, vulnerability isn't the sole cause; the author contends that harmful groups develop because members take ideas too seriously.

The article highlights examples like the Zizians, whose violent actions stemmed from their extreme interpretation of decision theory, and Leverage Research, which spiraled into occultism and abuse due to its reliance on the "Connection Theory" of psychology and its experimentation with unconventional practices. Black Lotus also exemplifies this, as members adopted a cynical worldview promoted by its leader.

The author concludes that while the desire to think independently is commendable, it can lead to individuals outsourcing their thinking to charismatic leaders, ironically making them more vulnerable to manipulation. The piece underscores that the rationalist community, despite its merits, struggles with providing adequate support to its most vulnerable members and can inadvertently create conditions ripe for the formation of harmful groups.
chinese_title: 为什么有这么多理性主义邪教？
chinese_summary:
Ozy Brennan的文章《为何理性主义者中会涌现如此多的类邪教组织？》探讨了一个令人惊讶的现象：尽管理性主义社群注重批判性思维，但它却常常孕育出功能失调甚至有害的团体。作者认为，该社群通过埃利泽·尤德科夫斯基的“序列”所宣扬的、凭借理性实现卓越和影响社会的隐含承诺，吸引了寻求变革和目标感的个人，有时导致他们寻求一种类似邪教的体验。

尽管尤德科夫斯基始终置身于社群建设之外，但文章指出，那些原本就存在精神健康问题、创伤或边缘化等情况的脆弱个体，尤其容易受到这些团体的影响。他们寻求接纳和解决方案，这使他们容易受到剥削。然而，脆弱性并非唯一原因；作者认为，有害团体的形成是因为成员们对某些观念过于认真。

文章列举了诸如齐兹教徒的例子，他们的暴力行为源于对决策论的极端解读；还有杠杆研究，由于其对心理学“连接理论”的依赖以及对非传统实践的实验，而陷入神秘主义和虐待。黑莲花也是一个例证，其成员采纳了其领导人所宣扬的愤世嫉俗的世界观。

作者总结说，尽管独立思考的愿望值得称赞，但它可能导致个人将自己的思考外包给有魅力的领导者，讽刺的是，这反而使他们更容易受到操纵。文章强调，理性主义社群尽管有其优点，但在为最脆弱的成员提供充分支持方面仍面临挑战，并且可能会无意中为有害团体的形成创造条件。

title: Wikipedia loses challenge against Online Safety Act
summary:
Wikipedia's legal challenge against the UK's Online Safety Act has failed in court. The Wikimedia Foundation, which supports Wikipedia, argued that the Act's verification rules could threaten the human rights and safety of its volunteer editors, potentially forcing them to verify user identities. They sought a judicial review of regulations classifying sites as "Category 1," the strictest category, fearing it would wrongly apply to Wikipedia due to its size and user-generated content, despite differing significantly from social media platforms.

The Foundation claimed that complying with Category 1 rules would require verifying contributors' identities, undermining their privacy, or drastically limiting UK access or functionality. The government argued ministers had considered and rejected exempting Wikipedia.

While the court rejected Wikimedia's arguments, the Foundation emphasized that the judgement highlighted the responsibility of Ofcom and the government to protect Wikipedia. Furthermore, the court left the door open for future legal challenges if Ofcom classifies Wikipedia as Category 1 or if the Act prevents Wikipedia from operating. Experts suggest Wikipedia could still be exempted during Ofcom's review. Ofcom acknowledges the judgement and will continue implementing the Act's safety rules.
chinese_title: 维基百科败诉，未能推翻《网络安全法案》
chinese_summary:
维基百科挑战英国《在线安全法案》的法律诉讼败诉。支持维基百科的维基媒体基金会认为，该法案的验证规则可能威胁其志愿者编辑的人权和安全，可能迫使他们验证用户身份。他们寻求对将网站归类为最严格的“第一类”的法规进行司法审查，担心该法规会因维基百科的规模和用户生成内容而错误地适用于维基百科，尽管它与社交媒体平台存在显著差异。

基金会声称，遵守第一类规则将需要验证贡献者的身份，从而损害他们的隐私，或者大幅限制英国的访问权限或功能。政府辩称，部长们已经考虑并拒绝豁免维基百科。

虽然法院驳回了维基媒体的论点，但基金会强调，该判决突出了英国通讯管理局 (Ofcom) 和政府保护维基百科的责任。此外，如果英国通讯管理局将维基百科归类为第一类，或者该法案阻止维基百科运营，法院为未来的法律挑战敞开了大门。专家表示，在英国通讯管理局的审查期间，维基百科仍然可以获得豁免。英国通讯管理局承认该判决，并将继续实施该法案的安全规则。

title: Modos Paper Monitor – Open-hardware e-paper monitor and dev kit
summary:
The Modos Paper Monitor is an open-hardware e-paper monitor and development kit aiming to advance e-paper technology beyond existing limitations by offering a customizable and accessible platform. Currently on Crowd Supply, seeking $110,000 in funding, the project offers 6-inch and 13-inch monochrome kits, powered by the open-source FPGA-based Caster controller, which supports refresh rates up to 75Hz. This allows for low latency and various update configurations.

The Modos Dev Kit is designed to overcome the proprietary nature, lack of standards, and high costs associated with e-paper devices. It's compatible with a wide range of screens and offers user-defined modes and a C API for full customization. The kit features a Xilinx Spartan-6 FPGA, DDR3 memory, and supports HDMI and USB Type-C DisplayPort input.

Comparisons highlight the Modos kits' advantages in refresh rate, open hardware design, programmable modes, and API access compared to other e-paper monitors and dev kits. The project includes extensive documentation, open-source design files on GitHub, and a supportive community. Manufacturing is planned with established partners, and fulfillment will be handled by Crowd Supply's partner, Mouser Electronics. The project acknowledges funding from the NLnet Foundation and the NGI Zero Etrust Fund. The 6" kit is priced at $199 and the 13" kit at $599 with estimated shipping in January 2026.
chinese_title: Modos纸张显示器 – 开源硬件电子纸显示器及开发套件
chinese_summary:
Modos Paper Monitor：一款旨在通过提供可定制和易于访问的平台，超越现有局限性，推进电子纸技术的开源硬件电子纸显示器和开发套件。目前正在 Crowd Supply 上众筹，寻求 11 万美元资金，该项目提供 6 英寸和 13 英寸单色套件，由基于开源 FPGA 的 Caster 控制器驱动，支持高达 75Hz 的刷新率，从而实现低延迟和各种更新配置。

Modos 开发套件旨在克服与电子纸设备相关的专有性质、缺乏标准和高成本。它兼容各种屏幕，并提供用户定义的模式和一个 C API 以实现完全定制。该套件配备 Xilinx Spartan-6 FPGA、DDR3 内存，并支持 HDMI 和 USB Type-C DisplayPort 输入。

对比显示，与其他电子纸显示器和开发套件相比，Modos 套件在刷新率、开源硬件设计、可编程模式和 API 访问方面具有优势。该项目包括详尽的文档、GitHub 上的开源设计文件和一个支持性社区。计划与已建立的合作伙伴进行制造，履行将由 Crowd Supply 的合作伙伴 Mouser Electronics 处理。该项目感谢 NLnet 基金会和 NGI Zero Etrust Fund 的资助。6 英寸套件的定价为 199 美元，13 英寸套件的定价为 599 美元，预计将于 2026 年 1 月发货。

title: A Spellchecker Used to Be a Major Feat of Software Engineering
summary:
This article contrasts the immense challenge of creating a spellchecker in the 1980s with its relative simplicity today. Back in 1984, programmers writing a spellchecker for MS-DOS word processors faced severe memory constraints, with only 256K-640K available. The article highlights the difficulty of fitting a comprehensive dictionary (around 2+ MB in raw text) within such limited space, forcing programmers to explore complex data compression methods and custom database solutions. Even reducing the dictionary size significantly was not a straightforward fix. They had to consider factors like floppy disk storage and user-added words.

Today, the author argues, building a basic spellchecker is trivial. Loading a standard dictionary into a hash table requires only a few lines of code in languages like Perl or Python, and word lookup is a built-in function. While optimizations are possible, the fundamental implementation is so simple that it's a common beginner exercise. The article uses the spellchecker as an example of how technological progress has significantly simplified certain software engineering tasks. The author concludes by emphasizing that this simplification is a testament to progress.
chinese_title: 曾经的拼写检查器是软件工程的一项重大成就
chinese_summary:
本文对比了上世纪80年代开发拼写检查器的巨大挑战与今日的相对简单。1984年，为MS-DOS文字处理器编写拼写检查器的程序员面临着严峻的内存限制，仅有256K-640K可用。本文强调了将一个全面的词典（约2+ MB的原始文本）装入如此有限空间内的难度，迫使程序员探索复杂的数据压缩方法和自定义数据库解决方案。即使大幅缩小词典的大小也不是一个简单的解决方案，他们必须考虑软盘存储和用户添加的单词等因素。

作者认为，如今构建一个基本的拼写检查器非常简单。将标准词典加载到哈希表中只需使用Perl或Python等语言的几行代码，并且单词查找是内置函数。虽然可以进行优化，但基本实现非常简单，以至于它是一个常见的初学者练习。本文以拼写检查器为例，说明了技术进步如何显著简化了某些软件工程任务。作者最后强调，这种简化是对进步的证明。

title: The Ancient Art and Intimate Craft of Artificial Eyes
summary:
Dan Roche's article, "The Ancient Art and Intimate Craft of Artificial Eyes," explores the history and modern practice of ocularistry, the art and science of crafting prosthetic eyes. The article traces the evolution of artificial eyes from ancient rudimentary forms made of materials like tar and bitumen to the sophisticated acrylic prosthetics of today.

Roche highlights the role of individuals like Ambroise Paré in the 16th century and the advancements made by Venetian glassmakers and Parisian porcelain artisans. He points out that early artificial eyes were often uncomfortable and unrealistic.

The article emphasizes that modern ocularists are rare, highly skilled artisans who blend technical expertise, artistic talent, and empathetic understanding. Their goal is not to restore vision but to create a realistic illusion that improves the wearer's appearance and self-esteem. Acrylic is the dominant material, allowing for a comfortable and realistic fit.

Roche describes the intimacy and personal attention involved in the process of creating and fitting a prosthetic eye, noting that ocularists often act as counselors and confidantes to their patients. He emphasizes that while achieving perfect symmetry is not always possible due to damage, a well-crafted artificial eye can significantly heal the trauma associated with eye loss or disfigurement. Finally, Roche shares his own experience of receiving a prosthetic eye and the positive impact it had on his life.
chinese_title: 义眼的古老艺术与精湛工艺
chinese_summary:
丹·罗奇的文章《义眼的古老艺术与精湛工艺》探讨了眼科义肢术的历史与现代实践，即制作义眼的艺术与科学。文章追溯了义眼从古代由焦油和沥青等材料制成的简陋形式到如今先进的丙烯酸义肢的演变历程。

罗奇重点介绍了16世纪的安布鲁瓦兹·帕雷等人的作用，以及威尼斯玻璃工匠和巴黎瓷器艺匠所取得的进步。他指出，早期的义眼通常不舒适且不逼真。

文章强调，现代眼科义肢师是罕见的、技艺精湛的工匠，他们融合了技术专长、艺术天赋和富有同情心的理解。他们的目标不是恢复视力，而是创造逼真的幻觉，以改善佩戴者的外观和自尊。丙烯酸是主要的材料，可以实现舒适逼真的贴合。

罗奇描述了制作和安装义眼过程中的亲密性和个人关注，并指出眼科义肢师通常扮演着患者的顾问和知己的角色。他强调，虽然由于损伤，总是达到完美的对称是不可能的，但制作精良的义眼可以显著治愈与眼部缺失或毁容相关的创伤。最后，罗奇分享了他自己接受义眼的经历以及它对他的生活产生的积极影响。

title: GitHub is (again) having issues
summary:
GitHub is experiencing an incident causing degraded performance and increased failure rates, primarily affecting search functionality. The issues began around 14:12 UTC on August 12, 2025, and have impacted various services including API Requests, Actions, Issues, Pull Requests, and Packages.

Initially, GitHub investigated reports of degraded performance in services backed by search and increased latency in API layers. Users experienced inconsistent experiences and stale search data when loading or querying issues, pull requests, labels, packages, releases, workflow runs, projects, and repositories.

While service availability has been mostly restored, some users are still experiencing increased request latency and stale search results. The GitHub team is actively working towards full recovery and mitigation of the ongoing issues. Updates are being posted regularly to the GitHub Status page.
chinese_title: GitHub 又出问题了
chinese_summary:
GitHub 正在经历事件，导致性能下降，故障率升高，主要影响搜索功能。问题始于 UTC 时间 2025 年 8 月 12 日 14:12 左右，并已影响包括 API 请求、Actions、Issues、Pull Requests 和 Packages 在内的各项服务。

最初，GitHub 调查了关于搜索支持的服务性能下降以及 API 层延迟增加的报告。用户在加载或查询 issues、pull requests、labels、packages、releases、workflow runs、projects 和 repositories 时，经历了不一致的体验和过时的搜索数据。

虽然服务可用性已基本恢复，但一些用户仍然遇到请求延迟增加和搜索结果过时的问题。GitHub 团队正在积极努力以全面恢复并缓解当前问题。更新会定期发布到 GitHub 状态页面。

title: I tried every todo app and ended up with a .txt file
summary:
Alireza Bashiri recounts his journey through numerous productivity apps (Notion, Todoist, Things 3, etc.) in a quest to find the perfect system, only to return to a simple `.txt` file. He found that while these apps offered sophisticated features, they often became time-consuming to manage and ultimately hindered his productivity. He experienced issues with pricing, sync problems, and the feeling of gaming the system rather than accomplishing real work.

His turning point came when he realized he could effectively manage his tasks with just a sticky note. This led him to adopt a minimalist system centered around a `todo.txt` file on his desktop. He structures the file with dated entries, adding tasks, notes, and times for scheduled items. Completed tasks are deleted or updated with details.

Bashiri highlights the advantages of this system: constant visibility, instant accessibility, AI integration (though not essential), speed, searchability, complete ownership, honesty in tracking progress, and long-term reliability. He emphasizes that true productivity stems from dumping tasks to free the mind, regular list review, and execution, rather than getting bogged down in complex organizational systems. He addresses potential feature concerns (reminders, projects, collaboration, mobile access) with simple solutions like calendar integration and Dropbox syncing. Ultimately, he found that the simplicity and ease of use of the `.txt` file boosted his productivity, proving that the best system is the one you consistently use. He encourages readers to try the method for a week.
chinese_title: 我试遍了所有的待办事项应用，最后还是用回了 .txt 文件。
chinese_summary:
阿里雷扎·巴希里讲述了他为了寻找完美系统，尝试过众多效率应用（Notion、Todoist、Things 3等）的历程，最终回归到简单的`.txt`文件。他发现，这些应用虽然提供了复杂的功能，但往往耗费时间管理，最终反而阻碍了他的效率。他遇到了价格问题、同步问题，以及玩弄系统而非完成实际工作的感觉。

他的转折点在于，他意识到自己仅仅用一张便签纸就能有效地管理任务。这促使他采用了一种以桌面上的`todo.txt`文件为中心的极简系统。他用带日期的条目来组织该文件，添加任务、笔记和预定事项的时间。已完成的任务会被删除或更新细节。

巴希里强调了该系统的优势：持续可见、即时访问、AI集成（虽然不是必需的）、速度、可搜索性、完全所有权、诚实地跟踪进度以及长期可靠性。他强调，真正的效率源于倾倒任务以释放大脑、定期审查清单以及执行，而不是陷入复杂的组织系统。他用简单的解决方案（如日历集成和Dropbox同步）解决了潜在的功能问题（提醒、项目、协作、移动访问）。最终，他发现`.txt`文件的简单性和易用性提高了他的效率，证明了最好的系统就是你一直使用的那个。他鼓励读者尝试这个方法一周。

title: That viral video of a 'deactivated' Tesla Cybertruck is a fake
summary:
A viral video claiming a Tesla Cybertruck was remotely deactivated by Tesla due to its unauthorized appearance in a music video has been debunked as fake. The video, posted by Instagram user @bighuey313, showed a flashing red warning message on the Cybertruck's screen and the user claimed Tesla shut off the vehicle on the freeway. He also posted a purported cease-and-desist letter from Tesla's legal VP, Dinna Eskin.

However, users quickly identified several inconsistencies, including errors in the cease-and-desist letter (incorrect title for Dinna Eskin and improper opening) and the atypical formatting of the warning message. Tesla confirmed the video's falsity in a tweet, stating their vehicles are not remotely disabled and the screen display was not theirs. Despite the evidence, the video spread rapidly across social media platforms, fueled by existing anti-Elon Musk sentiment. The article emphasizes that the video perpetuates pre-existing opinions about Tesla and its CEO, even though it's been proven to be a hoax.

title: Why We Migrated from Neon to PlanetScale
summary:
OpenSecret, a company building a confidential computing platform with its flagship product Maple AI, migrated from Neon to PlanetScale after experiencing critical reliability issues with Neon. In May 2025, Neon outages, coinciding with its acquisition announcement, caused their "serverless" databases to be down for hours, disrupting their AI chat service where data privacy is paramount. OpenSecret needs high reliability and observability because their database stores encrypted user data, rendering traditional debugging methods useless.

Neon's scale-to-zero architecture resulted in problematic cold starts and spin-up delays, and their usage-based pricing became expensive as user engagement grew. Furthermore, Neon lacked observability features like p99 latency metrics and query-level insights.

PlanetScale was chosen for its database focus, specifically on PostgreSQL, and its track record with Vitess. The migration was seamless using PlanetScale's open-source tools, with no downtime. PlanetScale's support was responsive and helpful.

The migration resulted in significant improvements: p99 latency improved to 1.0ms, API response times decreased by 45%, and query insights are now available. Cost decreased by 38% while infrastructure tripled with 8 replicas, providing automatic failover. Most importantly, downtime has been zero since migrating.

PlanetScale's observability tools are vital for optimizing OpenSecret's encrypted workloads, enabling them to identify slow queries and bottlenecks. The migration has allowed OpenSecret to focus on product development, and they are now looking forward to features like branching and sharding as they scale.

Neon的scale-to-zero架构导致了冷启动和启动延迟问题，并且随着用户参与度的提高，其基于使用量的定价变得昂贵。此外，Neon缺乏可观测性功能，例如p99延迟指标和查询级别的洞察。

PlanetScale因其对数据库的专注，特别是PostgreSQL，以及在Vitess方面的良好记录而被选中。 使用PlanetScale的开源工具进行迁移非常顺利，没有停机。 PlanetScale的支持响应迅速且乐于助人。

PlanetScale的可观测性工具对于优化OpenSecret的加密工作负载至关重要，使他们能够识别慢查询和瓶颈。 迁移使OpenSecret能够专注于产品开发，并且他们现在期待分支和分片等功能，以便进行扩展。

title: Qodo CLI agent scores 71.2% on SWE-bench Verified
summary:
Qodo Command, a CLI agent from Qodo, has achieved a 71.2% score on SWE-bench Verified, a leading benchmark for AI agents in real-world software engineering. This success highlights Qodo Command's ability to perform tasks like code review, test generation, bug fixing, and feature generation in complex, production environments.

The agent's performance is attributed to its architectural design, which prioritizes context summarization, execution planning, and retry mechanisms. Qodo Command distills code into precise summaries, ensuring relevant context for language models. It employs a plan-first approach, breaking down tasks into actionable subtasks for optimal execution, and features retry and fall-back strategies for handling tool call failures.

Powered by LangGraph, Qodo Command offers modularity and speed by orchestrating steps through a graph-based structure. It also uses powerful execution tools like FileSystem, Shell Tool, and Ripgrep to interact with the system and understand codebases.

Qodo Command is built to be flexible with LLMs, but uses Claude 4 for the SWE-bench Verified results. This flexibility is possible, in part, to a partnership between Qodo and Anthropic.

Qodo emphasizes code integrity automations and offers a UI mode with Qodo Merge for streamlined code review. The same version of Qodo Command that excelled on SWE-bench Verified is available for immediate use via `npm install -g @qodo/command`, enabling teams to automate code integrity workflows, accelerate code reviews, and generate various code artifacts.

title: The Article in the Most Languages
summary:
This Wikipedia Signpost article investigates the suspicious proliferation of articles about David Woodard, an obscure artist, across numerous language versions of Wikipedia. The investigation centers on the user "Swmmng," who created an unprecedented number of these articles (at least 92 in different languages) between 2017 and 2019, often relying on low-effort stub articles likely created using machine translation.

The article highlights several anomalies, including: the sudden appearance of multiple IP addresses from various locations translating Woodard's article into less common languages, the use of open proxies to add photos and content, and the potential connection between various users and IP addresses promoting Woodard. "Swmmng" also uploaded photos of Woodard and his wife Sonja Vectomov, claiming to have taken them personally, despite potential conflicts of interest.

The author details how several other accounts and IP addresses, notably "BarunH" and "Judgtastic", contributed to promoting Woodard's image by uploading photos and adding Woodard's name to various articles. The article points out that this activity appears to be a coordinated self-promotion campaign spanning over a decade involving potentially hundreds of accounts and proxy IP addresses. The sudden halt in these activities coinciding with an inquiry suggests a potential exposure of the operation. The author concludes that the coordinated campaign artificially inflated Woodard's notability, making him the subject of more Wikipedia articles than figures of far greater significance.

文章强调了若干异常现象，包括：来自不同地点的多个IP地址突然出现，将伍达德的条目翻译成不太常见的语言；使用开放代理添加照片和内容；以及推广伍达德的多个用户和IP地址之间可能存在的关联。“Swmmng”还上传了伍达德及其妻子Sonja Vectomov的照片，声称照片是他亲自拍摄，尽管存在潜在的利益冲突。

作者详细描述了其他几个账户和IP地址，特别是“BarunH”和“Judgtastic”，如何通过上传照片和在各种文章中添加伍达德的名字来帮助宣传伍达德的形象。文章指出，此活动似乎是一场历时十年以上的协同自我推广活动，涉及可能数百个账户和代理IP地址。这些活动在受到质询后突然停止，表明该行动可能已被曝光。作者总结说，这场协同活动人为地夸大了伍达德的知名度，使其维基百科条目的数量超过了许多重要得多的人物。

title: Claude Code is all you need
summary:
This article details the author's positive experience using Claude Code, Anthropic's code-focused tool, as a replacement for other AI coding assistants like Cursor, Cline, and Zed. The author found Claude Code more seamless and efficient, leading them to cancel their GPT subscription. They upgraded to Claude's MAX plan to avoid usage limits and explore the Opus model.

The author describes several projects built with Claude Code, including an experimental "autonomous startup builder" and a SplitWise replacement. The key takeaways are: trust the tool (even with risky permissions), provide extensive input for better output, and be surprised by its UI design capabilities.

The author explores "vibe coding," creating software solely through interaction with the AI model. They successfully built a basic SplitWise clone with a single prompt, highlighting the model's capabilities and sensitivity to input quality. A contrasting example demonstrates how a less guided prompt resulted in a complex, broken application with excessive dependencies.

The article further delves into an "autonomous startup builder" project, where Claude Code was given a VPS and instructions to build a startup. The AI autonomously developed a server monitoring web application, configuring the full stack with minimal human input. The author acknowledges criticisms of AI being "just pattern matching" but expresses genuine impressed with its capabilities.

The project hit a snag when Anthropic's usage policy was triggered due to automated marketing efforts. The author modified the prompt to comply with regulations, requiring human approval before posting content. Finally, the author was forced to post the content from the claude generated startup to hacker news.

chinese_summary:
本文详细介绍了作者使用Anthropic公司以代码为中心的工具Claude Code的积极体验，将其作为Cursor、Cline和Zed等其他AI代码助手的替代品。作者发现Claude Code更加无缝且高效，因此取消了他们的GPT订阅。他们升级到Claude的MAX计划以避免使用限制并探索Opus模型。

文章进一步深入探讨了一个“自主创业构建器”项目，该项目为Claude Code提供了一个VPS和构建创业公司的说明。AI自主开发了一个服务器监控Web应用程序，以最少的人工输入配置了完整的堆栈。作者承认了对AI“仅仅是模式匹配”的批评，但表达了对它能力的真正印象。

title: Artificial biosensor can better measure the body's main stress hormone
summary:
This article discusses a new artificial biosensor developed by Andy Yeh at the University of California, Santa Cruz, that can more accurately measure cortisol levels. Cortisol, a key hormone regulating bodily functions, is traditionally measured in clinical settings. Yeh's invention, described in the Journal of the American Chemical Society, uses a computationally designed protein-based biosensor that binds with cortisol and emits light, indicating the hormone's level.

The innovation lies in its ability to be used in a point-of-care setting. A simple drop of blood or urine mixed with the biosensor solution can be read by a smartphone camera, translating light emission into a quantitative cortisol measurement. This offers greater sensitivity and a wider dynamic range compared to existing tests, providing accurate results for low, normal, and high cortisol levels, potentially outside the range of traditional testing.

The biosensor's "mix and read" format, similar to rapid COVID-19 tests, makes it field-compatible and accessible. Yeh envisions its use in at-home testing, clinics, and drug development to better understand and treat health issues related to cortisol imbalances. The artificial protein design approach allows for a high degree of sensitivity and accuracy in detecting the hormone, potentially revolutionizing cortisol measurement and related healthcare practices.
chinese_title: 人工生物传感器能更好地测量人体主要应激激素。
chinese_summary:
本文探讨了加州大学圣克鲁兹分校的Andy Yeh开发的一种新型人工生物传感器，该传感器能更准确地测量皮质醇水平。皮质醇是一种调节身体机能的关键激素，传统上在临床环境中进行测量。Yeh在美国化学学会杂志上发表的这项发明，使用了一种通过计算设计的蛋白质生物传感器，该传感器与皮质醇结合并发出光，从而指示激素水平。

这项创新的关键在于其能够在即时诊断环境中使用。只需将一滴血或尿液与生物传感器溶液混合，即可通过智能手机摄像头读取，将光发射转化为定量的皮质醇测量值。与现有测试相比，这提供了更高的灵敏度和更宽的动态范围，为低、正常和高皮质醇水平提供准确的结果，甚至可能超出传统测试的范围。

该生物传感器的“混合即读”模式，类似于快速COVID-19测试，使其适用于现场并易于使用。Yeh设想将其用于家庭测试、诊所和药物开发，以更好地了解和治疗与皮质醇失衡相关的健康问题。人工蛋白质设计方法可以高度灵敏和准确地检测激素，有可能彻底改变皮质醇测量和相关医疗保健实践。

title: The ex-CIA agents deciding Facebook's content policy (2022)
summary:
The article argues that Facebook (Meta) is heavily influenced by the U.S. national security state due to its hiring practices, specifically in roles related to trust, safety, and content moderation. It highlights numerous instances of former CIA, FBI, Department of Defense, and other government agency officials holding key positions that dictate what content billions of users see.

The author contends that this influx of former intelligence officers, particularly from the CIA, raises serious concerns about Facebook's impartiality and potential alignment with U.S. government interests. The article suggests this arrangement allows Washington to exert influence over global information flows with a degree of plausible deniability.

The article points out specific individuals and their prior roles in intelligence or government agencies, emphasizing that these individuals now make decisions on content policy and information control on Facebook. It raises concerns about the potential for biased censorship, promotion of certain narratives, and suppression of dissenting voices. While not accusing the individuals of malicious intent, the author argues the structural problem of having so many ex-intelligence officials in key decision-making roles creates an inherent risk of biased or manipulated information.

The article also contrasts Facebook's supposed efforts to combat foreign disinformation campaigns with its apparent lack of action against potential U.S. government influence operations on its platform. The article concludes by suggesting that this influence could directly impact elections in other countries, such as the deletion of accounts supporting Nicaragua's ruling party prior to an election.
chinese_title: 决定脸书内容政策的前中情局特工 (2022)

文章认为，脸书（Meta）因其招聘行为，尤其是在信任、安全和内容审核相关职位上，受到美国国家安全机构的严重影响。文章着重指出，大量前中央情报局、联邦调查局、国防部和其他政府机构官员担任关键职位，决定着数十亿用户看到的内容。

作者认为，这种前情报官员，特别是来自中央情报局的涌入，引发了人们对脸书公正性和可能与美国政府利益保持一致的严重担忧。文章暗示，这种安排使华盛顿能够以一定程度的似是而非的否认，对全球信息流施加影响。

文章指出具体个人及其先前在情报部门或政府机构中的职位，强调这些人现在对脸书上的内容政策和信息控制做出决定。文章对可能存在偏见的审查、某些叙事的宣传以及异议声音的压制表示担忧。虽然没有指责这些个人怀有恶意，但作者认为，在关键决策岗位上拥有如此多的前情报官员，这种结构性问题造成了信息偏见或被操纵的内在风险。

文章还将脸书声称打击外国虚假信息行动的努力，与其明显缺乏针对美国政府在其平台上潜在的影响行动形成对比。文章最后暗示，这种影响可能直接影响其他国家的选举，例如在尼加拉瓜执政党选举前删除支持该党的账户。

title: GitHub is no longer independent at Microsoft after CEO resignation
summary:
Following the resignation of CEO Thomas Dohmke, GitHub is being integrated more closely into Microsoft's CoreAI team, signaling a shift away from its previously independent operation. Dohmke, who served as CEO for nearly four years, is leaving to become a startup founder. Microsoft will not be replacing him, and GitHub's leadership will now report directly to the CoreAI team.

This move represents a significant change in GitHub's structure since Microsoft acquired it in 2018. The CoreAI team, led by former Meta executive Jay Parikh, focuses on building AI platforms and tools for Microsoft and its customers. This integration suggests that GitHub's resources and development efforts will be increasingly aligned with Microsoft's overall AI strategy.

Previously, GitHub's reporting structure had changed in 2021, with Dohmke reporting to Julia Liuson, head of Microsoft's developer division, who subsequently reported to Parikh after the formation of the CoreAI team earlier this year. The article also notes Dohmke's recent appearance on Decoder discussing GitHub's role in the future of software development and its AI efforts, highlighting the timing of his departure. The move indicates a future where GitHub acts less as an independent entity and more as an integrated part of Microsoft's AI development efforts.
chinese_title: GitHub在微软已不再独立，此前CEO已辞职
chinese_summary:
继首席执行官托马斯·多姆克辞职后，GitHub正被更紧密地整合到微软的CoreAI团队中，这标志着该公司正逐渐偏离其此前独立的运营模式。担任首席执行官近四年的多姆克将离职成为一名创业公司创始人。微软将不会任命新的首席执行官，GitHub的领导层现在将直接向CoreAI团队汇报。

此举代表着自2018年微软收购GitHub以来，其结构上的重大变化。由前Meta高管杰伊·帕里克领导的CoreAI团队专注于为微软及其客户构建人工智能平台和工具。这种整合表明，GitHub的资源和开发工作将越来越与微软的整体人工智能战略保持一致。

此前，GitHub的汇报结构在2021年发生过变化，当时多姆克向微软开发者部门负责人朱莉娅·柳森汇报，后者在今年早些时候CoreAI团队成立后向帕里克汇报。文章还提到多姆克最近在Decoder节目中讨论了GitHub在软件开发未来中的作用及其人工智能工作，突显了他离职的时机。此举表明，未来GitHub将不再是一个独立的实体，而是作为微软人工智能开发工作的一个组成部分。

title: Starbucks in Korea asks customers to stop bringing in printers/desktop computers
summary:
Starbucks South Korea is cracking down on customers turning their cafes into de facto offices, a phenomenon known as "cagongjok" (café-study-tribe), by banning bulky items like desktop computers and printers. This policy change responds to an increasing trend of remote workers using Starbucks as a cheap alternative to traditional office space, driven by the COVID-19 pandemic, the rise of temporary contract jobs, and limited office space availability in Seoul.

While Starbucks aims to maintain its "welcoming third space," the policy reflects a growing concern about customers overstaying their welcome and monopolizing seating. The trend of working from cafes is tied to a historical Korean tearoom culture and has been amplified by remote work and the struggles of Korean companies to secure affordable office spaces. Many companies have realized they don't need the same real estate footprint and continue to let employees work remotely.

However, not all café owners are happy with this shift, with some labeling these customers "electricity thieves" due to their long stays with minimal purchases. Experts believe that Starbucks' policy signals a desire to rebalance the café experience back towards leisure and relaxation. Starbucks South Korea is majority owned by E-Mart Inc. but still overseen by Starbucks. South Korea has surpassed Japan in the number of Starbucks stores.
chinese_title: 韩国星巴克要求顾客停止携带打印机/台式电脑入内
chinese_summary:
星巴克韩国严打“咖啡馆办公族”，禁止携带台式电脑和打印机等笨重物品。此举旨在应对疫情、临时合同工增加以及首尔办公空间有限等因素驱动下，远程工作者将星巴克作为廉价办公场所的趋势。

虽然星巴克的目标是维持其“温馨的第三空间”，但该政策反映了对顾客过度逗留和占用座位的日益关注。在咖啡馆工作的趋势与韩国的历史茶馆文化有关，并因远程办公以及韩国公司难以获得经济实惠的办公空间而加剧。许多公司已经意识到他们不需要同样的房地产规模，并继续允许员工远程工作。

然而，并非所有咖啡馆老板都对这种转变感到满意，一些人称这些顾客为“电费小偷”，因为他们长时间逗留却很少消费。专家认为，星巴克的政策表明其希望将咖啡馆体验重新平衡到休闲和放松的状态。星巴克韩国由易买得公司控股，但仍受星巴克监督。韩国星巴克门店数量已超过日本。

title: High-severity WinRAR 0-day exploited for weeks by 2 groups
summary:
Two Russian cybercrime groups, RomCom and Paper Werewolf (GOFFEE), actively exploited a high-severity zero-day vulnerability (CVE-2025-8088) in the widely used WinRAR file compressor for weeks, starting around July 18th. The vulnerability allowed attackers to backdoor computers by planting malicious executables in normally off-limits directories via specially crafted archives attached to phishing messages.

ESET discovered the exploitation and notified WinRAR developers, who released a fix six days later. The exploit abused alternate data streams to bypass security measures. RomCom, a financially motivated group known for sophisticated attacks, used the vulnerability to deliver malware such as Mythic Agent, SnipBot, RustyClaw, and Melting Claw. Paper Werewolf also exploited CVE-2025-8088, along with CVE-2025-6218, to install malware for system access, impersonating employees of the All-Russian Research Institute in their phishing attacks.

While the groups' discoveries were independent, it's unclear if they are connected. The article highlights that WinRAR is a prime target for malware distribution due to its large user base and lack of automatic updates, requiring users to manually install patches. Users are urged to update to WinRAR version 7.13 or later to mitigate the vulnerabilities.
chinese_title: 高危WinRAR零日漏洞已被两团伙利用数周
chinese_summary:
俄罗斯网络犯罪团伙RomCom和Paper Werewolf（GOFFEE）自7月18日左右开始，积极利用WinRAR文件压缩软件中一个被广泛使用的高危零日漏洞（CVE-2025-8088）长达数周。该漏洞允许攻击者通过附加在网络钓鱼信息中的特制压缩包，将恶意可执行文件植入通常禁止访问的目录，从而对计算机进行后门攻击。

ESET发现了该漏洞的利用行为，并通知了WinRAR开发者，他们在六天后发布了修复程序。该漏洞利用了备用数据流来绕过安全措施。RomCom是一个以经济利益为动机的团伙，以其复杂的攻击而闻名，他们利用该漏洞传播了Mythic Agent、SnipBot、RustyClaw和Melting Claw等恶意软件。Paper Werewolf也利用了CVE-2025-8088以及CVE-2025-6218，安装恶意软件以获取系统访问权限，并在他们的网络钓鱼攻击中冒充全俄罗斯研究所的员工。

虽然这些团伙的发现是独立的，但尚不清楚他们之间是否存在联系。文章强调，WinRAR因其庞大的用户群和缺乏自动更新而成为恶意软件分发的主要目标，需要用户手动安装补丁。强烈建议用户更新到WinRAR 7.13或更高版本，以缓解这些漏洞。

title: Show HN: I built an offline, open‑source desktop Pixel Art Editor in Python
summary:
Tilf is an open-source, offline desktop pixel art editor built in Python using PySide6. It aims to provide a simple and accessible tool for creating sprites, icons, and small 2D assets without requiring account registration or complex setup. The key features include essential drawing tools (pencil, eraser, fill, eyedropper, rectangle, ellipse), canvas manipulation (zoom, background color, optional grid), undo/redo functionality, real-time preview, and import/export options for PNG, JPEG/JPG, and BMP formats.

Tilf runs on Windows, macOS, and GNU/Linux, with download links provided for each. The creator acknowledges the code's potential for improvement and welcomes contributions via pull requests. Instructions are provided for building the application on different operating systems, including creating executable files for Windows.

The editor offers keyboard shortcuts for common actions, autosaves on close to prevent data loss, and has some known limitations such as a 50-state undo/redo limit and potential performance issues with very large images. The project is licensed under GPL v3.0, and the developer provides contact information for inquiries and contributions. The goal is to create a straightforward and freely accessible tool for pixel art creation.
chinese_title: Show HN：我用Python构建了一个离线开源桌面像素画编辑器
chinese_summary:
Tilf 是一款开源、离线桌面像素艺术编辑器，使用 Python 和 PySide6 构建。它的目标是提供一个简单易用的工具，用于创建精灵图、图标和小型 2D 资源，无需账户注册或复杂的设置。主要功能包括基本的绘图工具（铅笔、橡皮擦、填充、取色器、矩形、椭圆）、画布操作（缩放、背景颜色、可选网格）、撤销/重做功能、实时预览以及 PNG、JPEG/JPG 和 BMP 格式的导入/导出选项。

Tilf 可在 Windows、macOS 和 GNU/Linux 上运行，并为每种操作系统提供了下载链接。创建者承认代码仍有改进空间，并欢迎通过 pull request 提交贡献。提供了在不同操作系统上构建应用程序的说明，包括为 Windows 创建可执行文件。

该编辑器为常用操作提供了键盘快捷键，在关闭时自动保存以防止数据丢失，并存在一些已知限制，例如 50 步撤销/重做限制以及处理非常大的图像时可能出现的性能问题。该项目根据 GPL v3.0 许可授权，开发者提供了联系方式以供咨询和贡献。目标是创建一个简单直接且免费使用的像素艺术创作工具。

title: All known 49-year-old Apple-1 computers
summary:
The Apple-1 Registry is a non-profit website dedicated to cataloging and documenting all known Apple-1 computers, the first computer made by Apple. It estimates that around 200 boards were made in two batches in 1976, and the registry aims to track and verify their existence and condition.

The site provides a searchable list of Apple-1 computers, including details like serial numbers (if present), batch information, location (if known), working condition, presence in museums, and available history. The registry contains information on 92 verified or almost verified Apple-1s, as well as information about those that might exist or may no longer exist.

The website also offers information about Apple-1 peripherals, software, and related documents. It emphasizes the rarity of the Apple-1 and expects their availability on the market to decrease as more are acquired by museums and companies. The registry also acknowledges the existence of high-quality replicas and warns potential buyers to be aware of them. The registry welcomes contributions of information and photos, offering contact information for that purpose. It provides a variety of statistics about the Apple-1, including the number of working units and those with original Byte Shop cases. The website also respects the wishes of owners who prefer their information to remain private.
chinese_title: 所有已知的49年历史的Apple-1电脑
chinese_summary:
Apple-1 注册表是一个非营利网站，致力于编目和记录所有已知的 Apple-1 电脑，这是苹果公司制造的第一台电脑。据估计，1976 年分两批生产了大约 200 块电路板，该注册表旨在跟踪和验证它们的存在和状况。

该网站提供 Apple-1 电脑的可搜索列表，包括序列号（如有）、批次信息、位置（如果已知）、工作状态、博物馆馆藏情况和现有历史等详细信息。该注册表包含 92 台已验证或几乎已验证的 Apple-1 电脑的信息，以及关于可能存在或可能已不存在的电脑的信息。

该网站还提供有关 Apple-1 外围设备、软件和相关文档的信息。它强调了 Apple-1 的稀有性，并预计随着越来越多的电脑被博物馆和公司收购，它们在市场上的供应量将会减少。该注册表还承认存在高质量的复制品，并警告潜在买家注意这些复制品。该注册表欢迎提供信息和照片，并提供联系方式。它提供了关于 Apple-1 的各种统计数据，包括工作单元的数量和带有原始 Byte Shop 外壳的单元的数量。该网站还尊重希望其信息保密的拥有者的意愿。

title: OpenSSH Post-Quantum Cryptography
summary:
This OpenSSH article discusses the implementation of post-quantum cryptography (PQC) to protect against "store now, decrypt later" attacks, where encrypted SSH sessions are stored and decrypted once quantum computers become capable of breaking current encryption standards.

OpenSSH has supported PQC key agreement algorithms by default since version 9.0, starting with `sntrup761x25519-sha512` and later adding `mlkem768x25519-sha256`, which became the default in version 10.0. OpenSSH 10.1 and later warns users when non-post-quantum key agreement schemes are used, which can be disabled using the `WarnWeakCrypto` option in the ssh configuration.

The article explains the threat posed by quantum computers to current cryptographic algorithms, particularly key agreement and digital signatures used in SSH. While quantum computers powerful enough to break cryptography are not yet available, the risk of "store now, decrypt later" attacks necessitates proactive implementation of PQC.

For users receiving the warning, the recommended solution is to update the SSH server to a version supporting `mlkem768x25519-sha256` or `sntrup761x25519-sha512`. Even if PQC algorithms prove weaker than expected, OpenSSH implements them as "hybrids" combined with classical algorithms to maintain at least the security level of existing methods. The article also mentions that OpenSSH will add support for post-quantum signature algorithms in the future.
chinese_title: OpenSSH 后量子密码学
chinese_summary:
这篇OpenSSH文章讨论了后量子密码学（PQC）的实现，以防御“现在存储，将来解密”攻击。在这种攻击中，加密的SSH会话被存储起来，并在量子计算机能够破解当前加密标准时被解密。

OpenSSH自9.0版本起默认支持PQC密钥协商算法，最初是`sntrup761x25519-sha512`，后来添加了`mlkem768x25519-sha256`，该算法在10.0版本中成为默认算法。 OpenSSH 10.1及更高版本会在使用非后量子密钥协商方案时警告用户，可以使用ssh配置中的`WarnWeakCrypto`选项禁用此警告。

文章解释了量子计算机对当前密码学算法构成的威胁，特别是SSH中使用的密钥协商和数字签名。虽然目前还没有强大到足以破解密码学的量子计算机，但“现在存储，将来解密”攻击的风险使得主动实施PQC成为必要。

对于收到警告的用户，建议的解决方案是将SSH服务器更新到支持`mlkem768x25519-sha256`或`sntrup761x25519-sha512`的版本。即使PQC算法的安全性低于预期，OpenSSH也会将它们与经典算法结合起来作为“混合算法”实现，以至少保持现有方法的安全级别。 文章还提到，OpenSSH将来会增加对后量子签名算法的支持。

title: Undefined Behavior in C and C++ (2024)
summary:
This article dives into the concept of undefined behavior (UB) in C and C++, explaining what it is, why it exists, and how to avoid it. UB isn't just a warning; it means the compiler can assume a particular condition will never occur and optimize accordingly, potentially leading to unpredictable and bizarre program behavior if that assumption is violated.

The article outlines several common sources of UB, including dereferencing bad pointers (null pointers, out-of-bounds access, double frees), using uninitialized data, signed integer overflow, out-of-bounds bit shifting, and aliasing violations (incorrect type casting with pointers). A comprehensive list of possible UBs is available in the C standard, though many are niche cases.

The rationale behind UB isn't solely about accommodating diverse hardware limitations. While historical hardware constraints played a role, the primary driver is optimization. Allowing UB gives compilers the freedom to make aggressive assumptions, especially concerning pointer usage and integer arithmetic, enabling significant performance gains through techniques like register allocation.

The author acknowledges the frustration UB can cause but argues that it's a necessary trade-off for the performance benefits in a language like C/C++. To mitigate the risks, the article recommends using compiler warnings, bounds checking tools, sanitizers, static analyzers, safety flags, or even turning off optimization altogether (though at a significant performance cost). Finally, the author playfully suggests using a different language as the ultimate solution. Some UBs are also listed, such as omitting a newline, that do not contribute to any optimization.
chinese_title: C/C++中的未定义行为 (2024)
chinese_summary:
本文深入探讨了C和C++中未定义行为（UB）的概念，解释了它是什么、为什么存在以及如何避免它。 UB不仅仅是一个警告；它意味着编译器可以假定特定条件永远不会发生，并据此进行优化，如果违反该假设，可能会导致不可预测的、怪异的程序行为。

文章概述了UB的几个常见来源，包括解引用坏指针（空指针、越界访问、双重释放）、使用未初始化的数据、有符号整数溢出、越界位移和别名违规（指针的错误类型转换）。 C标准中提供了可能的UB的完整列表，尽管其中许多是小众情况。

UB背后的基本原理不仅仅是为了适应不同的硬件限制。 虽然历史硬件约束发挥了一定的作用，但主要驱动力是优化。 允许UB使编译器能够自由地做出积极的假设，尤其是在指针使用和整数算术方面，从而通过诸如寄存器分配之类的技术实现显着的性能提升。

作者承认UB可能引起的沮丧，但认为这是在C/C++这样的语言中获得性能优势的必要权衡。 为了减轻风险，文章建议使用编译器警告、边界检查工具、消毒器、静态分析器、安全标志，甚至完全关闭优化（尽管会付出巨大的性能代价）。 最后，作者开玩笑地建议使用不同的语言作为最终解决方案。 一些UB也被列出，例如省略换行符，它们对任何优化都没有贡献。

title: What does it mean to be thirsty?
summary:
This article, "What Does It Mean to Be Thirsty?" by Dan Samorodnitsky, explores the neurobiology of thirst, explaining how our bodies signal the need for water to the brain.

The article explains that the brain, specifically areas like the hypothalamus and brainstem, monitors the body's water levels via sensors in the circumventricular organs (OVLT and SFO). These organs act like scientists testing blood to determine the body's salt/water ratio, inferring water needs. When salt concentration is high, these areas trigger the sensation of thirst.

Critically, the brain must anticipate water absorption, which takes 30-60 minutes. So, the brain makes "educated guesses" based on signals from the mouth, throat, and gut, estimating water volume. These signals quickly suppress thirst signals.

The article also touches on sodium (salt) homeostasis, crucial for cell function. While our bodies crave sodium, it's primarily regulated through taste and dopamine-driven reward pathways, unlike the strong, innate drive of thirst.

Finally, the article highlights that thirst is experienced differently across species. Using the example of the 13-lined ground squirrel, it demonstrates how hibernation can suppress thirst signals, even when the body requires water. Ultimately, how each animal manages water and salt is specialized to its ecosystem and evolutionary pressures, showcasing the diverse ways thirst manifests in the animal kingdom. The article concludes that the answer to "What does it mean to be thirsty?" varies depending on the organism.
chinese_title: 口渴意味着什么？
chinese_summary:
丹·萨莫罗德尼茨基的文章《口渴意味着什么？》探讨了口渴的神经生物学，解释了我们的身体如何向大脑发出需要水的信号。

文章解释说，大脑，特别是下丘脑和脑干等区域，通过脑室周围器官（OVLT和SFO）中的传感器监测身体的水分含量。这些器官就像科学家一样检测血液，以确定身体的盐/水比例，从而推断出水的需求。当盐浓度高时，这些区域会触发口渴的感觉。

关键在于，大脑必须预测水分的吸收，这需要30-60分钟。因此，大脑会根据来自口腔、喉咙和肠道的信号做出“有根据的猜测”，估计水的体积。这些信号会迅速抑制口渴信号。

文章还提到了钠（盐）的稳态，这对于细胞功能至关重要。虽然我们的身体渴望钠，但它主要通过味觉和多巴胺驱动的奖励通路来调节，这与口渴的强烈、内在的驱动力不同。

最后，文章强调了不同物种体验口渴的方式不同。文章以十三条纹地松鼠为例，展示了冬眠如何抑制口渴信号，即使身体需要水也是如此。最终，每种动物管理水和盐的方式都专门针对其生态系统和进化压力，展示了口渴在动物王国中呈现出的多样化方式。文章总结说，“口渴意味着什么？”这个问题的答案因生物而异。

title: Radicle 1.3.0
summary:
Radicle 1.3.0 is released, bringing several key improvements to the peer-to-peer code collaboration stack. A major feature is the introduction of canonical reference rules (`crefs`) via an identity payload, enabling more secure and controlled updates to references like tags. These rules specify which decentralized identifiers (DIDs) are authorized to update specific refs, with a threshold for required approvals.

The release also introduces the `radicle-protocol` crate, providing a sans I/O implementation of the Radicle protocol, improving modularity and paving the way for wider platform support. A significant step towards Windows compatibility has been taken; the rad CLI now works on Windows without WSL, though `git-remote-rad` and `radicle-node` still require further work.

title: The History of Windows XP
summary:
This article details the history of Windows XP, from its origins in Microsoft's desire to replace MS-DOS to its eventual release and success. Microsoft initially partnered with IBM for OS/2 but broke away due to disagreements, leading them to develop Windows NT with the help of David Neil Cutler Sr. NT was intended to unify Microsoft's consumer and business operating systems.

The initial consumer-focused NT project, "Neptune," was ultimately cancelled along with its enterprise counterpart "Odyssey," due to feature overload. They were merged into "Whistler," which became Windows XP. Microsoft enlisted frog design to create the visual elements, including the iconic Luna theme.

Key developments during XP's development included removing OS/2 support, dropping support for older processors, and integrating elements of Windows Me and Windows 2000. Beta testing led to significant design changes and the introduction of features like System Restore.

The release of XP was accompanied by a massive marketing campaign, rebranded due to the 9/11 attacks.  The famed "Bliss" background photo was purchased for a high price. Windows XP introduced Windows Product Activation (WPA), new network features, and compatibility mode for older software. Subsequent service packs (SP1, SP2, SP3) added features like USB 2.0 support, Wi-Fi security enhancements, and .NET framework support.  Windows XP achieved significant sales figures shortly after its launch.

title: The value of institutional memory
summary:
Tim Harford's article emphasizes the crucial value of institutional memory and the detrimental consequences of its loss. He opens with an anecdote about the Chesterfield Canal, where workers unknowingly drained the canal due to forgotten knowledge of a plug, highlighting the importance of retaining even seemingly insignificant information.

Harford illustrates how organizations, despite their purpose, can struggle to preserve institutional memory. He cites Volkswagen's repeated emissions scandals and NASA's Space Shuttle disasters as examples where the failure to learn from past mistakes led to significant repercussions. The Challenger and Columbia accidents, though distinct, shared a common thread of ignoring warnings and failing to retain crucial safety knowledge.

He further explains that organizations can forget not only significant events but also the processes and skills needed to perform tasks efficiently. The Lockheed TriStar airliner serves as an example of "forgetting by not doing," where reduced production led to a loss of expertise and increased costs.

Harford concludes by emphasizing that forgetting can occur through various factors, including employee turnover, the deterioration of physical and digital archives, and even deliberate destruction of records. He emphasizes that the erosion of institutional memory can have significant social consequences, pointing to the Windrush scandal as one example. He stresses the ease with which organizations can forget, even when they are actively trying to remember, and argues that it is imperative to actively combat this tendency.

title: Why tail-recursive functions are loops
summary:
This article explains the equivalence of loops and tail-recursive functions, highlighting their performance implications. Recursive functions are typically slower than loops due to stack frame pushing, which increases memory access and can evict data from the cache. Direct-style recursion requires O(n) stack space to store partial results.

Loops, on the other hand, use constant space and update an accumulator variable to store partial results, avoiding stack usage. Tail-recursive functions are a specific type of recursion where the recursive call is the last operation performed ("in tail position"). This allows compilers with tail-call optimization to transform these calls into `jmp` statements, effectively making them as efficient as loops, using constant stack space. The arguments of the function are updated mutably, mimicking the behavior of a loop.

The article illustrates how to convert a direct-style recursive function into a tail-recursive one by introducing an accumulator variable and returning it in the base case.  The author then poses two exercises for the reader to convert functions to use tail recursion. Finally, the article mentions that any program can be transformed into a tail-call form using Continuation-Passing Style (CPS), which trades a traditional stack for a heap-allocated representation, potentially avoiding stack overflows.
chinese_title: 尾递归函数为何是循环
chinese_summary:
本文解释了循环和尾递归函数的等价性，并强调了它们的性能影响。由于栈帧压入操作增加了内存访问并可能从缓存中逐出数据，递归函数通常比循环慢。直接递归需要 O(n) 的栈空间来存储部分结果。

另一方面，循环使用常量空间并更新累加器变量来存储部分结果，避免了栈的使用。尾递归函数是一种特殊的递归类型，其中递归调用是执行的最后一个操作（“在尾位置”）。这使得具有尾调用优化的编译器可以将这些调用转换为 `jmp` 语句，从而使它们与循环一样高效，使用常量栈空间。函数的参数被可变地更新，模仿了循环的行为。

本文阐述了如何通过引入累加器变量并在基本情况下返回它，将直接递归函数转换为尾递归函数。然后，作者提出了两个练习供读者将函数转换为使用尾递归。最后，本文提到可以使用延续传递风格 (CPS) 将任何程序转换为尾调用形式，CPS 用堆分配的表示来代替传统的栈，从而可能避免栈溢出。

title: 36B solar mass black hole at centre of the Cosmic Horseshoe gravitational lens
summary:

Here's a summary:

The article details the discovery and characterization of a supermassive black hole (SMBH) with a mass of approximately 36 billion solar masses (36B M⊙) located at the center of a distant galaxy that acts as a gravitational lens, known as the Cosmic Horseshoe. Researchers used data from the James Webb Space Telescope (JWST) to analyze the gravitationally lensed image and accurately model the lens system.

The primary finding is the accurate determination of the central SMBH's mass in the lensing galaxy. This large mass makes it one of the most massive SMBHs detected to date. Furthermore, the study allowed a precise determination of the galaxy's mass distribution, revealing details about its structure and dark matter content.

By carefully modeling the Cosmic Horseshoe's gravitational lensing effect, which magnifies and distorts the image of a background galaxy, the team was able to infer properties of the foreground lensing galaxy and, crucially, the central SMBH. The high spatial resolution and sensitivity of JWST were crucial for achieving this level of detail.

The study is significant because it provides a direct mass measurement of a SMBH in a distant galaxy, offering valuable insights into the co-evolution of galaxies and their central SMBHs at high redshift. The results contribute to the ongoing efforts to understand how such massive black holes formed and grew early in the Universe. The research highlights the power of gravitational lensing, combined with the capabilities of JWST, to probe the properties of distant galaxies and their central black holes.

title: Show HN: Play Pokémon to unlock your Wayland session
summary:
This "Show HN" post presents a unique project: a Wayland screen locker that replaces the traditional password prompt with a playable, patched Pokémon Gameboy game. The goal is to unlock the user's session by solving a puzzle within the game, essentially turning the login process into a mini escape room.

The author, a Linux enthusiast, was inspired by the customization possibilities of Wayland and the idea of blending fun with technical aspects of the operating system. The project uses the `ext-session-lock-v1` protocol (requiring a compatible compositor like Sway) to securely lock the session.

The implementation involves a custom-built low-level Wayland window using EGL and keyboard listeners, bypassing traditional GUI libraries like SDL. The author modified the `gbcc` emulator by adding a Wayland window backend and converting shaders to OpenGLES2. Critically, the Pokémon Crystal game was patched to include the puzzle logic, where entering the correct "password" (triggered by specific actions within the game, such as finding a hidden radio and then entering a specific password in-game) sets a specific RAM address to a predefined value. The locker monitors this address, unlocking the session upon detecting the correct value.

The project is considered experimental and comes with a warning about potential instability. The author provides a patch against a specific commit of the `pokecrystal` repository to modify the game for password entry. The code is dual-licensed under MIT (original `gbcc`) and GPLv3 (locker modifications).

title: Perplexity offers to buy Google's Chrome browser for $34.5B
summary:
AI startup Perplexity AI has made an unsolicited $34.5 billion bid to acquire Google's Chrome browser. This offer comes after the U.S. Department of Justice proposed Google divest Chrome as a remedy for its antitrust loss, arguing that Google's control over Chrome creates an unfair advantage in the search market. Perplexity claims venture investors are willing to fund the deal.

Chrome, launched in 2008, provides Google with valuable user data for targeted advertising. The DOJ believes forcing Google to divest Chrome would level the playing field for competing search engines. Google, however, has labeled the DOJ's proposal as "radical" and "wildly overbroad."

Perplexity, known for its AI-powered search engine and recently launched AI browser Comet, has been aggressive in its pursuit of growth, including a previous unsuccessful merger proposal with TikTok. The company was also approached by Meta for a potential acquisition. The AI startup is navigating a competitive landscape, with tech giants and startups investing heavily in AI infrastructure and talent.

title: Japan's largest paper, Yomiuri Shimbun, sues Perplexity for copyright violations
summary:
On August 7, 2025, Japan's largest newspaper, Yomiuri Shimbun, sued AI startup Perplexity for copyright infringement in Tokyo District Court. This marks the first such legal challenge by a major Japanese news publisher against an AI company.

Yomiuri claims that Perplexity accessed 119,467 articles from its website between February and June 2025, using the scraped content to reproduce copyrighted articles in response to user queries without permission. The newspaper alleges violations of its "right of reproduction" and "right to transmit to the public" under Japanese law, seeking nearly $15 million in damages and demanding a halt to the reproduction of its articles.

While Japanese copyright law allows AI training on copyrighted material, it prohibits wholesale reproduction or distribution that "unreasonably prejudice[s] the interests of the copyright owner."

A Perplexity spokesperson expressed regret and stated the company is committed to ensuring publishers benefit from AI.

This lawsuit follows similar legal actions taken by News Corp publishers The Wall Street Journal and the New York Post against Perplexity. OpenAI and Meta have also faced copyright infringement suits from international publishers. In India, several news publications have filed a joint suit against OpenAI, while French authors and publishers are suing Meta for "parasitism."

The Japan Newspaper Publishers and Editors Association has previously warned AI companies against scraping copyrighted material, arguing it could harm news organizations and the public's right to know.

虽然日本版权法允许人工智能使用受版权保护的材料进行训练，但禁止大规模复制或发行“不合理地损害版权所有者利益”的行为。

title: Chronic sleep deprivation harms development of growing babies
summary:
A University of Cincinnati study reveals the crucial role of sleep in the development of baby Pacific beetle-mimic cockroaches, drawing parallels to human pregnancies. Researchers discovered that when pregnant cockroaches are chronically sleep-deprived, it negatively impacts the development of their offspring, prolonging gestation and disrupting milk protein production, which is essential for nourishing the young.

These cockroaches, native to Hawaii and parts of Asia, are unique among insects because they give birth to live young and feed them with milk proteins in a manner similar to mammals with placentas. The study, published in the Journal of Experimental Biology, highlights the importance of adequate sleep for both the mother and the developing babies.

Lead author Ronja Frigard emphasizes that animal models, like the beetle-mimic cockroach, can provide valuable insights into human health, particularly concerning pregnancy and sleep. The research team, led by Professor Joshua Benoit, underscores the significance of prioritizing sleep, as its chronic deprivation can have cumulative adverse health consequences.

The study involved UC students, providing them with valuable research experience. One student, Gabrielle LeFevre, highlighted the collaborative and encouraging environment within Dr. Benoit's lab and encouraged participation in original research.

主要作者Ronja Frigard强调，像甲虫拟态蟑螂这样的动物模型，可以为人类健康提供有价值的见解，尤其是在妊娠和睡眠方面。由Joshua Benoit教授领导的研究团队强调了重视睡眠的重要性，因为长期的睡眠不足可能会对健康产生累积性的不良后果。

title: Byte Buddy is a code generation and manipulation library for Java

Unlike standard Java runtime code generation tools, Byte Buddy offers the flexibility to create completely new classes and isn't restricted to simple interface implementations like runtime proxies. This ability allows for more advanced and dynamic code generation scenarios within a running Java application. Essentially, it offers greater control and capabilities compared to standard Java library tools for runtime class creation.

title: The Joy of Mixing Custom Elements, Web Components, and Markdown
summary:
This article explores the benefits of combining Markdown, custom elements, and web components for web development. The author advocates for using Markdown's simplicity for text formatting and custom elements as "HTML macros" to represent complex UI components within Markdown content.

Markdown processors ignore HTML, allowing custom elements to be embedded directly within Markdown files. These custom elements, defined using web component standards, dynamically expand into complex HTML structures in the browser. This approach allows for a separation of concerns, where authors can focus on content in Markdown while developers create reusable components.

The author emphasizes the synergy between Markdown's text formatting and custom elements' ability to create more complex structures. Examples include a subscribe-to button. The article showcases a scenario where a Markdown paragraph includes a custom element that expands into a full HTML form.

The author also touches on the technical considerations, such as the need to explicitly close custom element tags and the challenges of multi-line attributes within Markdown. A Markdown pre-processor can address these issues by fixing the HTML before it reaches the Markdown engine.

Finally, the author encourages language design of custom elements, focusing on simplifying the information needed from authors and maximizing code-driven functionality. It discusses the pros and cons of server-side vs. client-side processing.

The database backend has been switched from LevelDB to SQLite, requiring a potentially lengthy migration on first launch. Logging has been overhauled to a structured format with per-package log level control and a new WARNING level.

Key changes include: deleted items are now forgotten after six months (configurable), command-line option parsing has been modernized (old single-dash options are no longer supported), rolling hash detection is removed for performance gains, and a default folder is no longer created on startup. Multiple connections are now used by default (three) between v2 devices. Prebuilt binaries are no longer provided for several less common platforms.

The release includes numerous bug fixes, feature additions, and performance improvements. New features include a `syncthing debug database-statistics` command, multiple connections by default, exposing folder and device info as metrics, Ed25519 keys for sync connections, bandwidth limiting in LAN via GUI, and UDP portmapping for QUIC. Several "chore" changes focus on internal improvements and code cleanup.

title: Faster substring search with SIMD in Zig
summary:
This article explores using SIMD (Single Instruction, Multiple Data) to accelerate substring searching in Zig, achieving up to 60% faster performance compared to `std.mem.indexOf`. The author implements a SIMD-friendly algorithm from Wojciech Muła's work, which involves comparing 32-byte blocks of the haystack against the first and last characters of the needle using SIMD registers. This generates bitmasks indicating potential substring occurrences, significantly reducing the number of necessary memory accesses.

The article details the Zig implementation, utilizing AVX2 instructions and Zig's `@Vector` and `@splat` functions. Benchmarks against a large text (Moby Dick) show substantial performance gains, including reduced CPU cycles. The author then investigates character selection strategies to minimize false positives and branch misses, further optimizing the SIMD version by choosing the rarest characters in the needle. This improved performance and reduced branch misses.

Finally, the article considers AVX-512 with 512-bit instructions and presents a version that dynamically adapts to the CPU's SIMD capabilities using `std.simd.suggestVectorLength()`. Microbenchmarks with smaller strings confirm that the SIMD algorithm remains faster even for small inputs. The author concludes that SIMD can dramatically improve substring searching performance in Zig, with potential for further optimization.

文章详细介绍了Zig的实现，利用了AVX2指令以及Zig的`@Vector`和`@splat`函数。针对大型文本（《白鲸记》）的基准测试显示出显著的性能提升，包括减少了CPU周期。作者随后研究了字符选择策略，以最大限度地减少误报和分支未命中，通过选择needle中最稀有的字符来进一步优化SIMD版本。这提高了性能并减少了分支未命中。

最后，文章考虑了使用512位指令的AVX-512，并提出了一个使用`std.simd.suggestVectorLength()`动态适应CPU的SIMD能力的版本。针对较小字符串的微基准测试证实，即使对于小型输入，SIMD算法仍然更快。作者得出结论，SIMD可以显著提高Zig中的子字符串搜索性能，并且具有进一步优化的潜力。

title: Mistral Integration Improved in Llama.cpp
summary:
This article discusses a pull request (PR #14737) in the llama.cpp project aimed at improving the integration of Mistral AI's models. The existing process of converting Mistral models to GGUF format (used by llama.cpp) was inefficient, involving a conversion to Hugging Face format first, potentially leading to errors. It also lacked native support for chat templates.

The PR introduces a new script, `convert_mistral_to_gguf.py`, for direct conversion from Hugging Face models to GGUF. It registers the Mistral architecture within llama.cpp, allowing native support without requiring intermediate conversions.  A REST API via FastAPI is also proposed to make the mistral-common tokenizer more accessible.

The PR advises using the llama-server tool with the `/completions` route and setting `return_tokens=True` to leverage mistral-common for tokenization and detokenization. The author acknowledges limitations regarding multimodal data support, as llama.cpp currently only supports this through chat templates.

Feedback from developers highlights the benefits of using a reference tokenizer for accuracy, while acknowledging the drawback of requiring a separate tokenization server.  Suggestions were made to include sliding window attention (SWA) parameters in the GGUF file.

Later discussion proposes merging the new conversion script's functionality into the existing `convert_hf_to_gguf.py` script for better maintainability and user clarity.  The discussion also touches upon supporting Voxtral models, which include audio components. Resolving dependency conflicts and addressing code formatting issues are also discussed as part of getting the PR ready for merging.

title: White Mountain Direttissima
summary:
The "White Mountain Direttissima" chronicles the author's attempt to complete a challenging unsupported trail run through the White Mountains of New Hampshire, aiming for a five-day completion. This was his third attempt after a six-day finish in 2016 and a DNF (Did Not Finish) in 2024 due to tendonitis.

The article details the daily mileage, elevation gain, and significant events encountered during the run. Day 1 involved multiple peaks and a painful fall on the tailbone. Day 2 included bushwhacking, sleep deprivation, and the first signs of potential tendon issues. Day 3 marked a turning point, surpassing the previous DNF point. Day 4 highlighted the Willey Range, Presidential Traverse, and an out-and-back to Isolation.

Day 5 was the final push, aiming to finish under five days. It involved climbing out of Carter Notch, traversing the northern Presidentials, and enduring difficult terrain on the Pliny-Pilot Range. The author faced physical challenges like a sore throat, aching body, and foot pain, but continued to "chip" away at the miles. The excerpt ends mid-sentence as the author realizes something on his way to Cabot.

title: GLM-4.5V: An open-source multimodal large language model from Zhipu AI
summary:
Zhipu AI has released GLM-4.5V, an open-source multimodal large language model built on the GLM-4.5-Air text foundation model, along with updates to the GLM-4.1V series. These models aim to enhance reasoning capabilities beyond basic multimodal perception for complex AI tasks.

GLM-4.5V achieves state-of-the-art performance on 42 vision-language benchmarks and excels in real-world usability by handling diverse visual content like images, videos, documents, and GUI tasks. It introduces a "Thinking Mode" switch for balancing response speed and reasoning depth.

GLM-4.1V-9B-Thinking, built on the GLM-4-9B-0414 model, focuses on reasoning through a Chain-of-Thought mechanism and RLCS (Reinforcement Learning with Curriculum Sampling). It supports 64k context length, any aspect ratio up to 4k image resolution, and is bilingual (Chinese/English). It outperforms larger models like Qwen-2.5-VL-72B on multiple tasks. A base model, GLM-4.1V-9B-Base, is also open-sourced for research.

The release includes model implementation code, download links, examples (GUI agents, desktop assistants), and quick start guides for inference using NVIDIA GPUs (with instructions for Ascend NPUs). Fine-tuning instructions using LLaMA-Factory and dataset construction examples are also provided. While improvements have been made since GLM-4.1V, limitations such as frontend code reproduction issues, pure text Q&A capabilities, and occasional overthinking/repetition remain.
